text: Alex Flávio Santos Luz (born 21 January 1993), known as Alex Flávio, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays for Portuguesa as a defender.Alex Flávio é o novo reforço da Portuguesa ==References== == External links == * * * Player's profile at pressball.by Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Belarus Category:Association football defenders Category:Cruzeiro Esporte Clube players Category:Mirassol Futebol Clube players Category:Barretos Esporte Clube players Category:Associação Desportiva São Caetano players Category:Clube Atlético Penapolense players Category:FC Energetik-BGU Minsk players Category:Associação Portuguesa de Desportos players
title: Alex Flávio
